item.title: From Catchy to Classic: 30 of the Most Memorable TV Theme Songs
item.description: From ‘Cheers’ to ‘The O.C.,’ ‘Succession’ and yes, of course, ‘Friends,’ The Hollywood Reporter rounds up the top tunes in television’s opening credits.

item.title: Peacock’s ‘Office’ Spinoff ‘The Paper’ Points Its Mockumentary Cameras at a New Subject in Trailer
item.description: The series from ‘The Office’ EP Greg Daniels and Michael Koman stars Domhnall Gleeson and Sabrina Impacciatore.

item.title: ‘The Office’ Alum Anthony Q. Farrell Boards Cricket Comedy ‘Strikers’ as Showrunner (Exclusive)
item.description: Dana Abraham and ‘Queer Eye’ host Bobby Berk created the indie series about the internationally popular bat and ball game and will also star.

item.title: U.K. ‘Office,’ ‘Luther’ Set for HBO Max Runs in Deal With BritBox
item.description: About 15 series from the BBC Studios-owned outlet will stream on HBO Max as part of a ‘pop-up’ agreement.
